code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import gsap from'gsap';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Loader=()=>{useEffect(()=>{const tl=gsap.timeline();tl.to('.loader-text span',{y:0,duration:1,stagger:0.1,ease:'power4.out'});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"fixed inset-0 bg-primary flex items-center justify-center z-50",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"loader-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loader-text overflow-hidden",children:['T','H','A','R','U','N',' ','K','U','M','A','R'].map((letter,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.span,{className:"inline-block text-4xl md:text-6xl font-bold text-secondary transform translate-y-full",initial:{y:100},animate:{y:0},transition:{duration:0.5,delay:index*0.05,ease:[0.43,0.13,0.23,0.96]},children:letter===' '?'\u00A0':letter},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.div,{className:"h-1 bg-secondary mt-4 rounded-full",initial:{width:0},animate:{width:'100%'},transition:{duration:2,ease:"easeInOut"}})]})});};export default Loader;
